mathalantayi me komentuwathambilata ba ban demalunta wage gemak gahanna.demalu awurudu 30 k allan hitiye thamilnaduwe sapot eka nisa.thambilata ehema sapot karanna ratak na.sithiyama aran balahan pakisthane idan nagenahira weralata aayudha gena eka prayogikada kiyala.nagenahira muslim janawasa ampare idan trinko wenakamma weralabadata sima wela.godabim praharayakata unta muna denna ba.demalu ehema noweyi .unta uthuru palathath nagenahira kotasakuth thibuna.demalunta batahira sahaya thibuna.thambila kulappu wunoth mulinma gahanne amarikankaraya.pilipine mindanawo wala dakkane.habayi thambilla monawa karayida kiyala kiyannath ba.unge aluth rajje skad misayilayak thiyanawalu.eeken wena balapaama eeka genayanakota para awahira wima kiyala yudha wishleshakayek kiyala thibunathambila wahasi bas dodanne amarikawe loka weladapalata gahuwe un kiyalane.amarikan karaya eewata hinawenne gudayen ban.amarikankarayata madaperadigata athul wenna hethuwak oona wela thibune.ema prahara pitathin ella wuwak noweya kiyala saka pahala wela thiyenne.amarikan buddhi ansha ekka happenna thambilata ba ban.demalu ekka yudde dinannath amarikan sahaya labuna.thambila thrasthawadi wada karanna aawoth indiyawayi amarikawayi eewa lath thana lop karanawa ban.habayi thambila thunwelatama kakiri kana potha katapadamkarana buddhimaththu nisa darga nagaraya wage thanaka kalif rajyayak hadayida kiyannath ba.
